title: Aromatherapy Massage - Chiropractic & Wellness Clinic
cleaned_text: Aromatherapy Massage Aromatherapy is the use of plant essences to promote spiritual, physical and emotional health and well-being. Essential oils can be applied directly to the skin through massage, added to bathing products or lotions, inhaled with steaming water or spread throughout a room by a diffuser. Aromatherapy
